theExplorer:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

theExplorer:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
theExplorer:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

theExplorer:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
Whenever you play a card, draw

theExplorer:JarOfDirt.NAME: Jar of Dirt
theExplorer:JarOfDirt.FLAVOR: It's a Jar of Dirt, what do you expect?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the beginning of combat, add #b2 random [#458B00]Plants[] to your hand.

theExplorer:Journal.NAME: Journal
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you complete a #ytheexplorer:Research, gain a random bonus.

theExplorer:Leftovers.NAME: Leftovers
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, deal #b1 damage to all enemies for each card in hand.

theExplorer:Painkiller.NAME: Painkiller
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a debuff is applied to you, reduce it by #b1 (but not below #b1).

theExplorer:Quill.NAME: Quill
theExplorer:Quill.FLAVOR: To be or not to be?

theExplorer:Whistle.NAME: Whistle
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever your #ytheexplorer:Companion uses its ability, gain #b4 block.
